bill.summary:
Full Military Honors Act of 2018
This bill provides full military honors for the funeral of an eligible veteran who:
is first interred or inurned in Arlington National Cemetery on or after enactment of this bill, was awarded the medal of honor or the prisoner-of-war medal, and is not entitled to full military honors because of such veteran's grade.
